K. Louise Medeiros is a statistician and data scientist. They're currently employed as a Data Scientist working on data quality initiatives at [**HERE Technologies**](https://here.com/) in Chicago, IL.

Louise has a MS in Biostatistics from the School of Public Health at [**Louisiana State University Health Sciences Center**](http://sph.lsuhsc.edu/). <br>

For more information about organizations and projects Louise is active in, see the Organizations tab.
